data.text: Jaricho ringo kaonge ngʼama lawe,
Ka piny toke tek, to en gi jotelo mangʼeny,
Jatelo mahinyo jochan
Jogo ma ok rit chik pako ngʼat marach,
Jomaricho ok ongʼeyo adiera,
Ber ngʼat ma jachan ma wuodhe ok cha,
Ngʼat marito chik en wuowi mariek,
Ngʼat mamedo mwandu gi ohala ma malangʼ choko mwandu ne ngʼat machielo,
Ka ngʼato odino ite ne chik,
Ngʼat matero ngʼat moriere tir e yo mar richo
Jamoko nyalo paro owuon ni oriek,
Ka ngʼat makare oloyo, nitie mor maduongʼ,
Ngʼat mapando richone ok dhi maber,
En ngʼama ogwedhi ngʼat moluoro Jehova Nyasaye kinde duto,
Kaka sibuor maruto kata ondiek madwaro kecho
Ruoth ma jasunga onge gi rieko,
Ngʼat moneko chunye chandore
Ngʼatno ma ja-adiera ibiro rito maonge hinyruok,
Ngʼat matiyo e puothe biro bedo gi chiemo mogundho,
Ngʼat ma ja-adiera ibiro gwedho mangʼeny,
Dok ne ngʼato kayiem ka oketho ok ber,
Ngʼat ma iye lit dwaro ahinya ni mondo obed gi mwandu
Ngʼatno makwero ngʼato gikone obiro yudo pwoch mangʼeny
Ngʼat mamayo wuon mare kata min,
Ngʼat ma jawuoro thoro kelo miero,
Ngʼat moketo genone kuome owuon ofuwo,
Ngʼat mamiyo jochan ok nochand gimoro,
Ka jaricho oketi e teko mondo otel, ji dhiyo kar pondo;
